FuncDef: This command configures a shortest path tree (SPT tree) switchover threshold for a group prefix.

ParaDef.Info: Defines the mask of the multicast-ip-address. Values-4 to 32.
The subnet mask in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255 (network bits all 1 and host bits all 0).

Specifies the configured threshold in kilobits per second (kb/s) for the group to which this (S,G) belongs. For a group G configured with a threshold, switchover to SPT for an (S,G) is attempted only if the (S,G)'s rate exceeds this configured threshold.
